tool_description: Monitors battery levels of wireless sensors and provides alerts when batteries need replacement or charging.

sensor_ids.description: Specific sensors to check (empty for all)

error_messages: Sensor not found: One or more specified sensor IDs do not exist
Invalid threshold: low_battery_threshold must be between 10 and 30 percent
Communication error: Unable to retrieve battery status from one or more sensors
usage: Optionally specify sensor_ids to check specific sensors, or leave empty to check all. Set low_battery_threshold for alert criteria.

low_battery_count.description: Number of sensors with low battery

battery_levels.description: Battery percentage for each checked sensor

sensor_names.description: Names corresponding to battery levels array

replacement_needed.description: List of sensors requiring battery replacement
